sentences: Mina ei öelnud midagi, ta on see, kes ütles.
context: "Ütles" is the past tense singular form of the Estonian verb "ütlema", which means 'to say' or 'to speak'. It's commonly used in narrative contexts to report what someone has said. The word conjugates as: ütlen (I say), ütled (you say), ütleb (he/she says), ütles (he/she/it said).
